Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 69th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Benjamin Martinez (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Carlo Tafoya (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2015, hitting .284 with 20 HR, 81 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/16/2017 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/19/2018 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2019, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Seattle to St. Louis (C) on 7/30/2019 (Going to STL: C James Gilligan. Going to SEA: C John Searles)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/2/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $8,075,000 per year...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Montreal on 5/31/2021 (Going to MON: C James Gilligan. Going to STL: 3B Lucas Cano, P Carlos Almonte, C James Bell)...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (C) on 6/5/2021 (Going to MON: 3B Lucas Cano, P Carlos Almonte, C James Bell. Going to STL: C James Gilligan)...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Montreal on 6/10/2021 (Going to MON: C James Gilligan. Going to STL: P Edward Landry)...
Injured on 7/17/2021 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 8/2/2022 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 4/23/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2023, hitting .421 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
